title: Body mass index gets smack down: AMA calls out harms and “racist exclusion”
description: The massive medical group says it has some value, but called for a better standard.

title: Report: Microsoft launched Bing chatbot despite OpenAI warning it wasn’t ready
description: Microsoft execs purportedly had "misgivings about the timing of ChatGPT’s launch."

title: Microsoft is selling screens, batteries, SSDs, and more for DIY Surface repairs
description: Microsoft has offered repair manuals for a while; now it has parts to match.

title: IBM compensates for errors, gets usable results out of quantum processor
description: May be a way to squeeze useful work out before we get quantum error correction.

title: Vulcan aces engine test, but upper stage anomaly will delay launch for a while
Google risks forced breakup of ad business as EU alleges shocking misconduct
description: Google could lose huge parts of its $225 billion ad business.

title: Comcast complains to FCC that listing all of its monthly fees is too hard
description: Comcast blasted for seeking "loopholes" in rule requiring disclosure of all fees.

title: Federal judge temporarily blocks Microsoft/Activision deal
description: Restraining order "maintain[s] the status quo" as FTC's case moves forward.

title: Satellites keep photobombing space images. Astronomers need a fix
description: A new technique could aid Hubble Space Telescope users.

title: Feds tell automakers not to comply with Mass. “right to repair” law
description: The state's right to repair law requires open access to telematics services.

title: Dealmaster: Last-minute savings to celebrate dads and grads
description: Gift ideas and deals for Father's Day and graduation.
